ActDepartment of Human Resources Development Act
PrecisApproval of the establishment of the Advisory Committee on Apprenticeship and of the appointment of DAVID HAGGARD of Burnaby, British Columbia, as Chairperson of the Committee, on a full-time basis, to hold office during pleasure, for a term ending September 30, 2005.
